DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , prospective observational cohort study , patient chronic airway disease include chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) , asthma , asthma-COPD overlap syndrome ( ACOS ) recruit .
DOC.criteria: COPD Postbronchodilator FEV1/FVC < 0.7 AND chronic respiratory symptom Asthma Never smoker < 5PY smoke history AND Recurrent episodes asthma symptom ( wheeze , dyspnea , chest tightness , cough ) AND ( either Positive BDR OR positive metacholine/mannitol/exercise provocation test ) ACOS COPD AND Asthma ( regardless smoke status )
